unnormalised: Borem, tor, tum ek trip plan kortai, hã? Bhari! Punn tum tunchi bag bhortat ani dongrar chai vo Goeantlea doriacher sopnam polletat, mhaka sangonk di, hanga khub serious number-anchi jugglery asa. Fakt kharch nhoi, punn IDsui! Tum tumchem sundor hasum gheun yetai titlem sovem nhoi tem.
normalised: Okay, mhunnllear, tumi bhonvddek yeujitai, hã? Borem asa! Punn tumi tumchiim thailiim bhorche adim ani dongraancher chai vo Goeantlea doriadegechim sopnam polleunche adim, hanv tuka sangtam, hanga zaati numbers samballcheakai asat. Fokot kharch nhoi, punn I-D-sui! Tumchea sobhit hãsyeachea sangata disunk yetat mhunnllear itlench sopeponnan zaina.

unnormalised: Poilem vostu poili, tumchem flight. Tem e-ticket PNR number, zoxem, sangta zata, 6XYZ89, tem laginch dovora. Screenshot kadda, tumchea hatar tem boroi zai tor (mazak kortam... chodd korun!). Tumkam tem sogllea vostun khatir zai poddtolem – checking in, boarding, extra peanuts magonkui (borem, peanutsak nhoi zata). Airlines aizkal, tankam PNR-achem jivit chodd mhotvachem dista.
normalised: Poili vost, tumchi flight. Tem e-ticket P-N-R number, mhunnllear, sãgche zaliar, so X-Y-Z aatth nau, to hajir dovora. Screenshot kaddat, tumche hatacher borait tumi zai zalear (kidding… chodd korun!). Tumka soglleavangdda to zai poddtto – check in korcheak, boarding korcheak, ekstra singdaanne magcheak (okay, singdaanne mellona!). Airlines aajkaal, tim sogllim P-N-R jivitacher asat.

unnormalised: Uprant Aadhaar card asa. Number zoxem 1234-5678-9012, tem yad dovora tumi adinch yad dovorunk na zalear. Tem tumchem go-to ID. Tem soglleakuch vichartat, hotels thavn sim card ghevcheak poriant. Fakt privacychea vostunchi zannvai asunk di, borem? Zait tor ek physical copy gheun vocha phone morta mhunn.
normalised: Uprant asa Aadhaar card. Number mhunnllear ek hozaar don shem teesaar dash panch hozaar so shem satt aaatth dash nau hozaar ani bara, to tonddpaatt kora tumi adinch korun naxillear. Hem tumchem go-to I-D. Tim soglleak vichartat, hotelam thavn sim card gheunche porosui. Fuddlea vellaak guptataa vixim chintum, okay? Eka velar physikal copy gheun vochat tumchea phonak zait zalear.

unnormalised: Passport, of course! Tum internationally udtai zalear. Ti lhan booklet magic dhorta. Punn tem valid asa mhunn tharavun ghe. Expired passport = vacation na. Passport number, zoxem ABC1234567, tem khub mhotvachem. Ani expiry date-ui check kara (dd/mm/yyyy format, sadharanponni). Hanv thaim aslo, Bangkokak vochpak mellunk na kiteak hanv expiry date-acher chuklolo mhunn. Tum mhaka toxem zaunk naka.
normalised: Passport, mhunnllear chodd korun! Tumi doriapalikadli flight zait zalear. Tem lhan pustok chitram dhorta. Punn tech bhaxen tem manyatai mhunn nischit kora. Manyatai naxil'lea passportan tumchi suttie xevttak yetana. Passport number, mhunnllear A-B-C ek don tin chaar panch so satt, hem mahatvachem. Expiry date-ui chodd korun pollaat (D-D slash M-M slash Y-Y-Y-Y format, sadharan). Hanv thoim axil'li, Bangkokk vochpaak mellunk laglo karann hanvem expiry date-ak thoddo vell dilo. Mhoji bhaxen zaunaka.

unnormalised: Train travel? IRCTC registration khup mhotvachem. Tumchem user ID mhotvachem. Tumchem PNR number, kitem tori zoxem 4567891230 – taka sonneachem dhulhi toxem sambhall. Tumchem ticket print kara; digital cool aslem tori, sumar TT-ank paper version odhik ruchta, kiteak tori.
normalised: Trainan bhonvta? I-R-C-T-C registration zaiuch poddtto. Tumchem user I-D mahatvachem. Tumchem P-N-R number, mhunnllear chaar arbon panch shem saatth sat kotti aatth shem ekon'naavai hozaar don shem tees – taka bhangarachem dhul mhunn lekhu. Tumchem ticket print kora; digital borem aslem tori, thodde T-T-s kagodachem pasand kortat, koslea tori karannak lagun.

unnormalised: Ani road trips khatir, driver’s license asa. To DL number check kara, zoxem UP7020100001234, valid asa ani tum kitemch rule torunk na. Ani, tum ek tour guide ghevun bhonvtat zalear, tankam Tourist Guide License number asa mhunn check korop mhotvachem. Tem sadharanponni GT2024/001 zoxem asta.
normalised: Ani road trip-anchea khatir, driver's license asa. Check that D-L number, mhunnllear U-P satt zeru don zeru ek zeru zeru zeru zeru ek don tin chaar, manyatai asli ani tumi kosleui kaide moddna mhunn dhyan dium. Plus, tumi eka tour guideachea sangata zait zalear, tanchi Tourist Guide License number polleun gheunchem mahatvachem. Tem sadharan G-T don hozaar ani tees chaar slash zeru zeru ek bhaxen asta.

unnormalised: Hotelsank IDs khub avoddtat. Tankam tumchem Aadhaar, passport, DL zai poddtto – kitem tori photo ani tumchem nanv asun. Copies laginch dovora. Tem check-inak sovem karta. Kednaim tankam PAN number-ui zai poddta – zoxem ABCDE1234F – khas korun tum bhari amount bhortat zalear.
normalised: Hotelam I-D-s zai. Tankam tumchem Aadhaar, passport, D-L - kiteim photo ani tumchem nanv asllem zai. Copy hajir dovora. Check-in sopem zata. Kiteakui punn tim tumchem P-A-N numberui magtat – mhunnllear A-B-C-D-E ek don tin chaar F - khas korun tumi chodd poiso dit zalear.

unnormalised: Basically, aizkal travel ek number-ancho khel zalea sarke asa. Tumchea IDs-ank sambhalla, numbers laginch dovora, ani tum tea doriacher coconut udok pieyetolem "Incredible India!" sangta tea poros vegim. Safe travels, bhau bhoinnim! Tumchem charger visor naka!
normalised: Mhunnllear, bhonvddi aizkal numberachem khel bhaxen asa. Tumchiim I-D-s vevosthit dovora, number hajir dovora ani tumi "Incredible India!" mhunnche adim ttuven tea doriache vatecher narllachem udok pieunche. Safe travels, mhunnllear lokam! Tumchem charger visrun naka!
